description: TractorE60HS-18AGTRAnne C JolyEmail: anne.joly@nrcan-rncan.gc.caNatural Resources Canada has a requirement for a Tractor.This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-645-75635 .As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days.The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is February 28, 2023.
full_summary:
=====================================

### NRCan Contracting Opportunity

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01013183
**Contracting Agency**: Natural Resources Canada
**Location**: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Tender Type**: Request for Proposal
**Goods or Services**: Tractor (Tracteur)

**Background**
---------------

Natural Resources Canada has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of a tractor, which is a requirement under the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HS-18AGTR/A. All potential suppliers must hold a valid SA under this arrangement to participate in this bid solicitation process.

**Key Details**
---------------

*   **Contract Date**: February 28th, 2023
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Region**: Quebec (except for the National Capital Region)
*   **Delivery Schedule**: Must be available for delivery on the specified contract date

**Instructions to Tenderers**
-----------------------------

Prospective suppliers must submit their proposals electronically through the Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca website. Tenderers must review the notice and requirements carefully and respond according to the guidelines outlined in the notice.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

*   Contact Person: Anne C. Joly at Anne.Joly@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
*   Tender Description: This notice is published for a period of 15 calendar days to meet the requirements of the Supply Arrangement.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-24T13:00:00 (**Not Correct!**   ; the notice will close on Nov 24, 2022, and this has **expired**)
*   **Contract Award Date**: Not Specified

**Language of Communication**
---------------------------

French and English communications with the contractor will be accepted. Written submissions will be accepted in French or English.

[1] This entry is **EXPIRED** and has already closed on Nov 2022. Please refrain from submitting bids for this opportunity. [1] There are no files for download with this entry. [1]This was made to note the **tenderClosingDate** had expired.  \[1]: This was to note the **tenderClosingDate** had expired.

After you've read through this, would you like any additional work done to it (e.g. add some because profiling, discipline control, training) etc.?
